\index{module@\spxentry{module}!core.models@\spxentry{core.models}}\index{core.models@\spxentry{core.models}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{CampingInfo (class in core.models)@\spxentry{CampingInfo}\spxextra{class in core.models}}\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:module-core.models}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:core.models.CampingInfo}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\DUrole{k}{class}\DUrole{w}{ }}}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{core.models.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{CampingInfo}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{o}{*}\DUrole{n}{args}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{o}{**}\DUrole{n}{kwargs}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{TranslatableModel}}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Stores general camping rules and schedules.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Fields include reception hours, arrival and departure times, and gate opening hours.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Security:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
No direct user input, so XSS or SQL injection risk is minimal.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}
\index{translations (core.models.CampingInfo attribute)@\spxentry{translations}\spxextra{core.models.CampingInfo attribute}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:core.models.CampingInfo.translations}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysigline
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{translations}}}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a
many\sphinxhyphen{}to\sphinxhyphen{}one relation.

\sphinxAtStartPar
In the example:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{class}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nc}{Child}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Model}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{n}{parent} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{ForeignKey}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Parent}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{related\PYGZus{}name}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{children}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Parent.children}} is a \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ReverseManyToOneDescriptor}} instance.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager
class built by \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_forward\_many\_to\_many\_manager()}} defined below.

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{FoodInfo (class in core.models)@\spxentry{FoodInfo}\spxextra{class in core.models}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:core.models.FoodInfo}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\DUrole{k}{class}\DUrole{w}{ }}}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{core.models.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{FoodInfo}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{o}{*}\DUrole{n}{args}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{o}{**}\DUrole{n}{kwargs}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{TranslatableModel}}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Stores information about food services such as food trucks, pizza days,
bread reservations, and bar opening hours.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Translations:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Automatically translates burger and pizza days using DeepL API.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Logs translation errors without interrupting save process.

\end{itemize}

\sphinxlineitem{Security:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
No user input is directly processed here, reducing XSS risk.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
DeepL API errors are caught and logged.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}
\index{translations (core.models.FoodInfo attribute)@\spxentry{translations}\spxextra{core.models.FoodInfo attribute}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:core.models.FoodInfo.translations}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysigline
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{translations}}}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a
many\sphinxhyphen{}to\sphinxhyphen{}one relation.

\sphinxAtStartPar
In the example:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{class}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nc}{Child}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Model}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{n}{parent} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{ForeignKey}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Parent}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{related\PYGZus{}name}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{children}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar

\index{save() (core.models.FoodInfo method)@\spxentry{save()}\spxextra{core.models.FoodInfo method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:core.models.FoodInfo.save}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{save}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{o}{*}\DUrole{n}{args}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{o}{**}\DUrole{n}{kwargs}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Overrides save to automatically translate certain fields into multiple languages
using DeepL API. Errors are logged but do not interrupt saving.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Security:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Only controlled default values are translated; no user input is processed.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{translations (core.models.LaundryInfo attribute)@\spxentry{translations}\spxextra{core.models.LaundryInfo attribute}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:core.models.LaundryInfo.translations}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysigline
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{translations}}}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a
many\sphinxhyphen{}to\sphinxhyphen{}one relation.

\sphinxAtStartPar
In the example:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{class}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nc}{Child}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Model}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{n}{parent} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{ForeignKey}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Parent}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{related\PYGZus{}name}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{children}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Parent.children}} is a \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ReverseManyToOneDescriptor}} instance.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager
class built by \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_forward\_many\_to\_many\_manager()}} defined below.

\end{fulllineitems}

\section{Reservations}
\label{\detokenize{index:reservations}}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar

\end{itemize}
\index{module@\spxentry{module}!reservations.views@\spxentry{reservations.views}}\index{reservations.views@\spxentry{reservations.views}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{reservation\_request\_view() (in module reservations.views)@\spxentry{reservation\_request\_view()}\spxextra{in module reservations.views}}\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:module-reservations.views}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:reservations.views.reservation_request_view}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{reservations.views.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{reservation\_request\_view}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{request}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Handles reservation requests from users:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
GET: display empty reservation form

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
POST: validate form, translate message, send email to admin, show success message

\end{itemize}

\sphinxlineitem{Security measures:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Form validation via ReservationRequestForm

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Escape user\sphinxhyphen{}provided message to prevent XSS

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Deepl API errors are caught and logged, original message preserved

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Email sending is wrapped, fail\_silently=False

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
No sensitive data (API key) is exposed to templates

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

\end{fulllineitems}

\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar

\end{itemize}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Form}}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Form to handle reservation requests from customers.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Fields:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Customer info: name, first\_name, address, postal\_code, city, phone, email

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Reservation dates: start\_date, end\_date

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Accommodation details: accommodation\_type, tent dimensions, vehicle\_length

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Guests: adults, children\_over\_8, children\_under\_8, pets

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Electricity info: electricity, cable\_length

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Message: optional free text

\end{itemize}

\sphinxlineitem{Security:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Fields are validated and escaped to prevent XSS

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Conditional fields validated in \sphinxtitleref{clean()}

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:bookings.models.SupplementPrice}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysiglinewithargsret
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\DUrole{k}{class}\DUrole{w}{ }}}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{bookings.models.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{SupplementPrice}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{o}{*}\DUrole{n}{args}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{o}{**}\DUrole{n}{kwargs}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Model}}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Stores additional pricing options for reservations.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Fields:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
extra\_adult\_price: price per extra adult

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
child\_over\_8\_price: price per child over 8 years

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
child\_under\_8\_price: price per child under 8 years

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
pet\_price: price per pet

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
extra\_vehicle\_price: price per additional vehicle

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
extra\_tent\_price: price per additional tent

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
visitor\_price\_without\_swimming\_pool: visitor price without pool

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
visitor\_price\_with\_swimming\_pool: visitor price with pool

\end{itemize}

\sphinxlineitem{Security:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Only stores numeric data

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
No user input processed directly

\end{itemize}

\index{prices (bookings.models.SupplementPrice attribute)@\spxentry{prices}\spxextra{bookings.models.SupplementPrice attribute}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:bookings.models.SupplementPrice.prices}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysigline
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{prices}}}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a
many\sphinxhyphen{}to\sphinxhyphen{}one relation.

\sphinxAtStartPar
In the example:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{class}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nc}{Child}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Model}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{n}{parent} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{ForeignKey}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Parent}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{related\PYGZus{}name}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{children}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Parent.children}} is a \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ReverseManyToOneDescriptor}} instance.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager
class built by \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_forward\_many\_to\_many\_manager()}} defined below.

\end{fulllineitems}


\end{fulllineitems}

Stores the base pricing for different types of accommodations and seasons.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Fields:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
booking\_type: main type (tent, caravan, camping\_car)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
season: low/mid/high

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
is\_worker: boolean flag for worker rates

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
price\_1\_person\_with\_electricity, price\_2\_persons\_with\_electricity

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
price\_1\_person\_without\_electricity, price\_2\_persons\_without\_electricity

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
supplements: related SupplementPrice

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

\index{translations (bookings.models.OtherPrice attribute)@\spxentry{translations}\spxextra{bookings.models.OtherPrice attribute}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:bookings.models.OtherPrice.translations}}
\pysigstartsignatures
\pysigline
{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{translations}}}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a
many\sphinxhyphen{}to\sphinxhyphen{}one relation.

\sphinxAtStartPar
In the example:

\begin{sphinxVerbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]
\PYG{k}{class}\PYG{+w}{ }\PYG{n+nc}{Child}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Model}\PYG{p}{)}\PYG{p}{:}
    \PYG{n}{parent} \PYG{o}{=} \PYG{n}{ForeignKey}\PYG{p}{(}\PYG{n}{Parent}\PYG{p}{,} \PYG{n}{related\PYGZus{}name}\PYG{o}{=}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{l+s+s1}{children}\PYG{l+s+s1}{\PYGZsq{}}\PYG{p}{)}
\end{sphinxVerbatim}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Parent.children}} is a \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ReverseManyToOneDescriptor}} instance.

\sphinxAtStartPar
Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager
class built by \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{create\_forward\_many\_to\_many\_manager()}} defined below.

\end{fulllineitems}

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
name, description\_text: French version

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
name\_en/es/de/nl, description\_en/es/de/nl: translated versions

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
night\_price, week\_low/mid/high: nightly and weekly prices

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
is\_worker\_home: reserved for workers

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
worker\_price\_1p/2p/3p: weekly prices for workers

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

\pysigstartsignatures

{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{bookings.views.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{booking\_form}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{request}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Display and process the initial booking form where the user selects:
\sphinxhyphen{} Booking subtype (tent, caravan, etc.)
\sphinxhyphen{} Start and end dates
\sphinxhyphen{} Initial booking preferences (electricity, number of people‚Ä¶)

\sphinxAtStartPar
Security:
\sphinxhyphen{} Use Django forms for input validation.
\sphinxhyphen{} Convert decimals and dates to safe formats before saving in session.
\sphinxhyphen{} Validate capacity with Booking.check\_capacity to prevent overbooking.

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{booking\_details() (in module bookings.views)@\spxentry{booking\_details()}\spxextra{in module bookings.views}}

Once valid, create a Stripe Checkout session for deposit payment.

\sphinxhyphen{} Never trust session directly, always validate with Django form.
\sphinxhyphen{} Stripe key is read from Django settings.

\end{fulllineitems}

{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\DUrole{k}{class}\DUrole{w}{ }}}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{bookings.forms.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{BookingFormClassic}}}
{\sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{data=None}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{files=None}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{auto\_id=\textquotesingle{}id\_\%s\textquotesingle{}}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{prefix=None}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{initial=None}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{error\_class=\textless{}class \textquotesingle{}django.forms.utils.ErrorList\textquotesingle{}\textgreater{}}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{label\_suffix=None}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{empty\_permitted=False}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{instance=None}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{use\_required\_attribute=None}}\sphinxparamcomma \sphinxparam{\DUrole{n}{renderer=None}}}
{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{ModelForm}}

\sphinxAtStartPar
Client booking form.
\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Main fields:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
booking\_type: campsite type (tent, caravan, camper, etc.)

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
start\_date / end\_date: arrival and departure dates

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
adults, children\_over\_8, children\_under\_8, pets: number of people and pets

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
electricity: whether electricity is required

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
cable\_length: required if electricity is selected

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
tent\_width / tent\_length, vehicle\_length: specific dimensions depending on type

\end{itemize}

\sphinxlineitem{Security:}\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Dates cannot be in the past.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
Conditional fields are validated based on campsite type.

\item {} 
\sphinxAtStartPar
All data is cleaned via clean() method.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

\item {}

\item {}

\end{itemize}

\end{description}

\sphinxhyphen{} Strips leading/trailing spaces for all text fields.
\sphinxhyphen{} Normalizes email to lowercase.
